title: Font ID required
content:
Hello, I can’t find that font, can you help me?

Thank you

| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090624061151/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_48.jpg) | 180.15 KB |
author: webimedia

comments.content: Most likely handlettered. Do you have any more examples that suggest it is a digitized font?
Yes It’s digitized, I have edited my post and uploaded one more example, whith a “plus”
I’m incredulous. It may be a digital font, but I really think it’s handlettered. Good luck.
